page.title: 17Travel And Transport
page.content: On Thursday I went to Astill and Jordan, the bus company in our Domesday Project.We were told that the company had 2 coaches and 5 double deckers.We asked if they had any lady workers and were told that they used to have one but she got the sack because she had too many accidents.They employ 9 men and provide buses for four schools.The buses are swept out every day and washed when they have some spare time. {Sarah Dexter. The first vehicle that Mr Astill had in 1920,when he started was an old coal vehicle which he fitted with seats and nicknamed the Cockerel because of the sound which its horn made.The present garage was built after the last war using an ex-RAF Hanger in Station Road.
